bucketName.description: Optional name for the bucket. If not provided, a unique name will be automatically generated by Pulumi.

public.description: Whether the bucket is public. If true, the bucket will be publicly accessible. By default, the bucket will be private.

encrypted.description: Whether the bucket is encrypted. If true, the bucket will be encrypted at rest. By default, the bucket will not be encrypted. The bucket will be encrypted using the default S3 KMS key.

versioning.description: Whether the bucket is versioned. If true, the bucket will be versioned. By default, the bucket will not be versioned.

protected.description: When a bucket is deleted, all of its content will be deleted too. If this option is set, it won't be possible to delete a bucket that has objects in it.
